string.name: parent
string.value: In Search of the Book of Ancient
So I need the #bMemory Powder#k to put the map pieces back as one...I better talk to #bCorporal Easy of Alpha Platoon#k and see if he has it.

Ohhh, this is it. The piece of a map that shows where #b#t4031056##k is at ...! But they are in pieces, after all, which is no good...Wait, #b#p2030002##k of Alpha platoon must have found #b#t4031055##k while investigating something around the Orbis Tower. Can you get the item for me, please? Thank you!

I'm studying these four pieces of #b#t4031054##k, but these don't mean a thing unless they are put together! #b#p2030002##k of Alpha platoon must have found #b#t4031055##k while investigating something around the Orbis Tower. Can you get the item for me, please? Thank you!
